families.label: Clarity & Structure
families.description: Measures structural quality: character usage, word counts, token density, and efficient use of metadata real estate.

families.label: Keyword Architecture
families.description: Evaluates keyword quality, composition, and distribution. Includes high-value keywords, noise ratios, and incremental keyword coverage.

families.label: Hook & Promise Strength
families.description: Measures the strength of opening hooks, promises, and value propositions. Includes action verbs, benefits, and specificity signals.

families.label: Brand vs Generic Balance
families.description: Evaluates the balance between branded search (navigational) and generic discovery (informational/commercial). Critical for organic reach.

families.label: Psychology & Alignment
families.description: Captures psychological signals: benefit density, specificity, redundancy penalties, urgency, and social proof indicators.

families.label: Intent Alignment
families.description: Measures alignment with search intent patterns: navigational, informational, commercial, and transactional signals.
